scripts.dockerize: docker build -t chat-back ./backend && docker build -t chat-bot ./bot && docker build -t chat-front ./front
scripts.get-services: docker run --name mongoService --net chatroom-net -d mongo:4.0  && docker run -d --hostname amqpService --name amqpService --net chatroom-net rabbitmq:3
scripts.kill: docker container stop backend && docker container rm backend && docker container stop front && docker container rm front && docker container stop bot && docker container rm bot
scripts.deploy: docker run -d --name backend --net chatroom-net -p 4100:4100 chat-back && docker run -d --name bot --net chatroom-net -p 4000:4000 chat-bot && docker run -d --name front --net chatroom-net -p 8080:80 chat-front
